post.body: Some of us Stumble your sites for you :D.
Thx for follow. I have a nephew in Israel, in army. Thinking of him right now.
I'm in higher ed (comm/PR/govt relations as staff, & part-time PhD student, sort of, unless I quit because it's taking so long).
The one that really give me trbl are late-night for male enhancement pills. Really that many insomniac gullible men?
Found you to follow thx to twittergrader; looks as if we have common interests: volunteering, transportation, politics.
Found you thx to twittergrader suggestion. I'm bike commuter & active transportation activist, interested in yr transp policy work.
Saw tweets asking abt this, wondered why ppl so opposed to obvious next step. Doesn't bug me. #journchat
For yr questioner: If percv'd value then there will be sponsors. If not, not. Yr time organizing/leading has value.
Just be in the moment during long commercial breaks ;D
You knew that was an irresistible RT even for those who aren't looking to get laid, right? I'm LOL at great Google tips.
Maybe part of it is cuz you're doing #journchat all wk/most pay attn Mon nights. I run a srch to my reader so I saw yr tweets.
Thx to our exchange I rolled out the mat & did 45 minutes of yoga. Twitter fitness resolution support group in the making? :D
Thx for nail tech referral; I'll let you know!
For me it's putting the bike on the trainer, getting back into yoga, & maybe trying out the elliptical we got 18yo daughter.
I wonder if Twitter discipline is like going to the gym: lasts into the 2nd week of January, then back to the old habits :D
I need to set autotweets to myself: Have you eaten your 5 fruits/veggies today? Just had 1st (an apple)--not enough for this late in day.
RT @PressReleasePR For blog post: Does anyone have examples of their hometown using Twitter effectively to promote tourism? Tag #town
I don't autofollow those who follow me. #1 reason I don't follow back: No bio. #2: All tweets are sales pitches. #3: No sharing in tweets.
Replace get laid w/find customers & this prob still works. RT @ariherzog RT @jeremymeyers: How to use google to get laid: http://bit.ly/P4qc
Meditating (sort of--or meandering, or musing) on the Zen of fingernails, suffering, and attachment: http://twurl.cc/an9
